column5: im heading down in the morning with my dad, anyone from the OFC community going to be there? say hi if you see me, black F-150 with a 16ft Crestliner ill post the results in the afternoon
Upper or lower woodro? It will most likely be really dirty from all of this rain
I am hoping to get there next week in the lower so we would love to hear how it goes  Johnny

squid im heading to the lower in hopes of bumping into a steelie. i dont think the rain effects the river that much due to the size, i could be totally wrong, i'll let you know how i made out tomorrow when i get back
the winds are picking up tonight to 30k's, this could potentially be a bad situation for me in the morning

I've never fished the lower, but I've already called off my plans to hit the upper this week-end.  With the wind that is expected the river will be brown above the falls, wouldn't expect much better below.

winds aren't that bad right now....3:00AM....in the falls that is...Fort Erie has higher winds right now thou, hope,  they hold off for my morning fish, I am hitting the river too but not from a boat!!
change of plans, my father didnt wake up and info from above posts put doubt in my mind. so went to a favourite trib and landed a bunch of fresh steelies instead.
